Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: Johnson & Johnson (the “Company”) announced on February 14, 2023, that Paula A. Johnson, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Honeywell, has been appointed to its Board of Directors (the “Board”), effective immediately. Ms. Johnson will serve as a member of the Board’s Nominating & Corporate Governance Committee, effective as of April 27, 2023. As a non-employee Director of the Company, Ms. Johnson will receive compensation as described in the “Director Compensation” section of the Company's 2023 Proxy Statement. The Company’s press release announcing the appointment is attached to this Report as Exhibit 99.1.

subsections.exhibit_list: Exhibit No. 99.1: Press Release dated September 14, 2022. Exhibit No. 104: The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL.
